website_summaries.verdict: A standard bathtub that will fit into all sorts of homes, condos, and apartments.  Good price too.
pros: Constructed from durable long-last materials, this bathtub will stand the test of time, maintaining its beautiful porcelain finish
It is easy to install and will work with standard plumbing fixtures
Includes a non-slip surface to avoid accidents
cons: Somewhat plain vanilla appearance compared to other bathtubs
Practical and functional rather than a beauty contest winner

customer_reviews.title: Solid tub!
customer_reviews.text: Looked for months for the best tub. We kept looking as beautiful tubs that were more square and modern but the reviews were often really scary. Cracked, flimsy, don't hold hot water long.... blah, blah, blah.. This tub holds hot water for at least an hour, did not need to add insulation or build up the floor. It weighed 160+ lbs while many of the others were 45-75 lbs. It looks great and we love it! BEWARE: Order Artic White if you are looking for a true bright white tub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, large orange peel appearance in many areas. There were very few areas that were relatively smooth.
customer_reviews.text: The finish was VERY inconsistent: VERY LARGE orange peel effect in some areas and relatively smooth in others. It was not coated evenly or thoroughly. Shame on you AMAZON for not allowing me to review the terrible delivery regarding this product! You totally dropped the ball but refuse to allow the post. It IS relevant to the product if your delivery and follow up regarding the product is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Americast finish not glossy smooth anymore. Expect orange peel.
customer_reviews.text: The finish on these tubs is horrible. Am Std saw this video and authorized replacement. check YouTube for American Standard 2460.002 Cambridge The replacement was just as bad. Project now four weeks behind. A local distributor had four in stock - drove an hour - all four as bad as video. Now, Am Std says bad orange peel is up to their Americast division’s standards, although they advertise “smooth glossy finish”. My 23 year-old Americast tub at home still has a nice, smooth glossy finish”, but Am Std’s actual standards have apparently gone down the drain. Don’t buy if you expect a finish resembling porcelain, it’s worse than actual orange peel.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B

customer_reviews.title: Love this tub!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub! We remodeled our 50 year old bathroom. The old tub was enameled cast iron. It had been cleaned so often that the finish was worn and even after cleaning it still looked dirty. This tub is deep, perfect for a bath and soooo easy to clean!!!! I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Dan North

customer_reviews.title: Great tub, tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great tub, bit when they say 60", they mean it... It's not 59 1/2 or even 59 13/16... It's 60", so if you have exactly 60" opening, or any variability in the studs, etc., you are in for a install treat. The good news is that I have a reciprocating saw and was able to hack a bit and muscle it in, but be aware that this is exactly 60".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this tub if you want deeper and doesn't feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub. All other tubs I looked at were plastic and cheap feeling yet cost more. This feels like the older metal tubs but is deeper. Installer had no issues installing by himself since the weight was much lighter than cast iron tubs. The water definitely stays hotter longer. My only wish would be that American Standard would give those of us who like to soak a few more inches by moving the overflow up a little more. Not sure why it needs to be so low when others are putting them closer to the top.
customer_reviews.author: love2learn

customer_reviews.title: I am a home builder and have used many of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a home builder and have used many of these tubs and put them in my own house. Very heavy and stout without the cold surface such as cast iron or marble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: The bathing width is barely 24", not 26" as stated
customer_reviews.text: The material is very good and solid. The tub is deeper than other bathtubs on the market. However, I chose this bathtub for it's material and dimensions, specifically it's width. But, when we opened it, immediately, I noticed that it doesn't offer the promising width. The bathing dimensions stated online was 26" W. I measured the width from different points along the sidewalls from inside. it's barely measures 24". Very disappointing. The total width of bathtub is 2" bigger than regular bathtubs in the market. but it offers the same width from the inside. I'm thinking to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mourice

customer_reviews.title: American Standard Cambridge Tub Review.
customer_reviews.text: This tub was delivered by two strong and polite young men who took great care to get it in our front door without damaging the tub or our doorway. It is a beautiful tub and looks so much better than the cheap fiberglass one we had. If you're looking for a nice deep soaking tub with the feel of an old fashion cast iron tub, then this is the tub for you. An added bonus is that the tub doesn't weigh as much a traditional cast iron tub.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable bathtub
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a deeper tub that would fit the old standard tub but would not be acrylic. This one was my choice and I am glad I went with it. I like it as it now holds more water but still made solid like my old cast iron tub and it is comfortable as the back area has just the right angle to lean back and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Bouravnev

customer_reviews.title: I love my new tub!
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of a tub that you could only fill to 9" deep. Now I can really soak. Contractor installed by himself. It seems a little narrower than previous tub, even though it is 2" wider overall, but I think the taller walls just make it feel narrower. Finish has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Best bathtub!
customer_reviews.text: Great for soaking. I am 5 feet tall. Stays warm. Easy clean up. Perfect. Will buy again. Delivered to doorstep! Plumber said he could not have bought one for the price with his discount at his vendor. Welcome to my amazon life!
customer_reviews.author: SI

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is gorgeous, deep, well constructed (quality feel) and was delivered perfectly. I have a victorian home with a remodeled bathroom and this really fit the bill. I couldn't believe the good price I got on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: V. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time is a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had a few issues ordering this tub. I was looking for a small tub that was deep and this was the one. I looked everywhere and went to many stores but the ones sold at home depot or lowes did not have the depth i was looking for. The first time I ordered it i received it with a few chips so I returned it. The second time I ordered the tub it arrived with some parts not painted!!! I was determined to get the tub I wanted so i ordered it a third time. This time it came perfect. It is sturdy and comfortable. I love the depth and the non slip feature.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Big beautiful tub
customer_reviews.text: A nice tub that was a big improvement to our bathroom. Getting it into the alcove proved a tough job because there was a lot of sheet rock in the way because the old fiberglass tub/shower was a lot smaller but once I cut it out this tub slipped right in. The tile man finished up and left us with a big beautiful tub. You can get a real good soak in a tub this deep.
customer_reviews.author: JohnSwof

customer_reviews.title: A deeper tub for the price of a standard one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tub at a great price! Shallow enough to bath the kids, but deep enough for a nice grown-up soak. Nothing like this was available at my local big box stores. The only drawback is that I find the non-skid patches in the bottom of the tub hard to clean. Even with little use and hard scrubbing they look kind of dingy.
customer_reviews.author: V. King

customer_reviews.title: This is a Nice Tub
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our bathroom and installed myself. Easy install, other than the weight factor. Wife loves it. Guests love it. Looks great. I am a hero again. Originally bought a special order fiberglass tub from the local home improvement store that came cracked from the factory. Decided fiberglass was not for me and ordered this tub. Delivery was very fast and there was no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Okeeffe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deep tub!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! If youre in the market for a tub this is the one! Its SO DEEP, and if you get the deep soak you end with a whopping 16" of soaking depth!! It was tricky to get installed, as some other reviewers have said, this is EXACTLY 60" not 59 1/2" like most '60" tubs so getting it in was pretty tight for me, but it works if youve got a few inches of wiggle room. Went in pretty easy other than the sizing issue! Easy to clean and keeps water warm for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Corbyn

customer_reviews.title: So deep
customer_reviews.text: The tub is very deep, but not hard to get in and out of. It's great to have a standard size alcove tub that is comfortable to bathe in. I like the non-slip bottom. It can get a little dirty but it scrubs right out with a magic eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtub once it was put in
customer_reviews.text: Great bathtub once it was put in, but don't buy online because American Standard doesn't pack the bathtubs very well at all. Our first one came in and the drain was all smashed and cracked. The second one seemed okay but when unpacked the underneath bar was broken but at least we were able to use it anyway. There is absolutely no styrofoam or anything to protect the tub in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Pai Mei

customer_reviews.title: 3 damaged tubs
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this tub if I hadn’t came in damaged. I ordered 3 separate times (only once from amazon, twice from a local store). Every single time it came in with chips in the porcelain. When I called American Standard to inquire about buying a paint kit to fix the chips (because we were without a tub and I was tired of ordering and sending them back), they advised that it wasn’t a good idea and we should not keep it. We ended up going with an acrylic tub in a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice solid tub. After searching around this tub appear online to be a good balance of quality\$. Once I got it I was very please with my decision. Solid, sturdy well made tub for the money. I was skeptical to order a tub online too. It showed up in a truck and two very nice gentlemen wheeled it to my garage and allowed me inspect before signing. Who knew Amazon sold bathtubs...
customer_reviews.author: dmill

customer_reviews.title: hello porcelain
customer_reviews.text: This bathtub is wonderful. After remodeling in 2006 and having to replace the tub again this year, we decided we never wanted to replace the bathtub again. This tub fits the bill. The tub is well made and everything the description say it would be. Was easy to install with just two people. Only thing I would change is for it to be a couple inches longer so I could stretch out. Holds heat well with the porcelain finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to replace old cast iron tub don’t like the look of acrylic. This is a nice looking tub and it’s sturdy. It is is deeper than it looks which is great for soaking. I use a grip bar to step in and out with no problem. The bottom has some type of coating to prevent slipping when showering and it really works. I was concerned it would be difficult to clean but so far no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Parli

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice soaking depth
customer_reviews.text: Received this fairly quickly, no damage in shipping. I enjoy the extra soaking depth over my old tub, and it seems to be fairly well insulated for heat retention. It is slightly off-white, as others have said, but this is not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is a good thing for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for new house construction. It's deeper than I was expecting, which is a good thing for me. It will be a great soaker tub. And it looks beautiful. It arrived in perfect condition. It is also much better quality than a typical fiberglass tub. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: Great tub! Deep and great for the kids to soak. One review said the tub was overly textured, but I disagree. It’s perfect! Recommend! Shipping takes longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: best game

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: After we bought this tub and had it installed we noticed bubbling in the finish in the corner. Now to return it we would have to rip out tile and have everything reinstalled. Be sure to look it over day one.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Cogan

customer_reviews.title: TRIED & TRIED AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder the bath tubs over and over again. They came in inside the box damaged. We are still waiting for you to pick up the 2 bathtubs. The last ones we received were OK
customer_reviews.author: dorothy s.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy tub and has worked flawlessly for 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy tub and has worked flawlessly for 2 years now. The only real issue is the grey/brown dirt buildup in the textured bottom can be a bit stubborn to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: IV

customer_reviews.title: Love this tub!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this tub at a hardware store and it wasn’t going to arrive on time when I had the plumber scheduled to install. I looked and Amazon delivered!!!! Deeper than most regular tubs we love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent tub
customer_reviews.text: It's very solid, sturdy metal versus the flimsy fiberglass or plastic tubs. Went in easy and is nice and deep. Not really big enough for two people though, but for the price I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: An amazing bathtub. The price makes it even better. Quality material and looks great. Plenty of space and it’s heavy not flimsy like the others. The best alternative to when replacing a cast iron tub. Easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aparna Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tub
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful white, not Artic white. Excellent enamel work, shipped on a crate which was great. I went with a triplever drain instead of AS drain. I have a cast iron and I can't tell the difference except in weight. I do not know about heat retention yet as it hasn't been used.
customer_reviews.author: Danita

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Came with some chips in the enamel, on the upper edge, did not effect install. Check when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Sturdier than others at this price point. Came damage free and my contractors had no issues installing it.
customer_reviews.author: MBrenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this tub because I wanted a porcelain tub to replace the one I had removed in my guest bathroom. It is perfect, fits well in the standard size space and is not as heavy as the one that had to be broken up to remove it. I highly recommend this tub.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Best tub you could ever ask for
customer_reviews.text: Best tub you could ever ask for! I love a deep tub and I'm a pretty curvy girl and i fit just fine. Really keeps the heat, too! Also ample room for your head to tilt back and rest - very important! You won't regret getting this tub!
customer_reviews.author: rakututu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love our new tub! It fits well but it was a different color white than the tile so we had to change our tile choice last minute but it all worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good selection available from Amazon sellers
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than synthetic tubs. Arrived in good condition. Not easy to install, even for professionals, but instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: KevinF

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable tub
customer_reviews.text: We had this installed seven months ago and it's been a great tub so far. It was delivered when expected and the delivery man put it in our garage and even opened it up to make sure there was no damage. As some have mentioned, the non-skid surface does get a slightly beige cast from use, so if you want a pristine tub this might not be the best choice. It doesn't look dirty, but you can see the diamond pattern where the non-skid surface is applied. It is a bit cold to step into since it's steel, but since we previously had a cast-iron tub I expected that. It looks great and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: must be sure space is exact fit
customer_reviews.text: the edges get easily scaled out in case of rough handling. Esges get rust after a while
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Enamel scratched during install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tub to replace a 100-year old cast iron tub, and the enamel surface is already in worse shape than the tub it replaced. Numerous fine scratches all over the tub, and I haven't even used it yet. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: PHILIP J FREEMER

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet as we just installed it. Unfortunately, in our remodel a tile fell into the tub and chipped it. We should have protected it better. That is on us, anyway it looks good and we are happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tub
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub. It was a little more than I wanted to spend but I wanted it to feel solid and this one does. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: nice and deep
customer_reviews.text: Well insulated, nice and deep. I'm not sure that I like the grippy surfaces on the bottom of it but they aren't uncomfortable or super noticeable and they should help keep me from slipping and faceplanting in the shower so I suppose I can live with them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsikins

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this tub! Very deep, so far it's been easy to clean, and came with no issues. So pleased with this purchase. Even my contractor was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1234

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Deep Tub
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bathtub! It is very sleek looking. This bath is much deeper than the one that we replaced, and has generous edges that could hold bottles. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gbmliv22

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It replaces a bathtub that accommodated water ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It replaces a bathtub that accommodated water up to my ankles -- that's it. But I will say I've never had to work quite so hard to keep something clean, and I don't know why. The chemicals in my water seem to love it and I have to spray the tub with bleach and wash it done every time I use it - something the old tub didn't require.
customer_reviews.author: dinahpfaff

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is fabulous! Worth the price point and delivery went well. My husband and eldest son were able to get it in our door and up a flight of stairs. I won't lie, it was heavy but doable. It holds heat well and is fairly comfortable. It worked very nicely for our standard 1970's small bathroom as well. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: aabecker

customer_reviews.title: Love this tub
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub! It is much deeper than most (though the emergency drain is a little low so you can't go to the top of the tub with the water as it pours out the vertical drain. But the water level is still pretty high. It is also great for two people. Awesome price. The shippers were kind. They brought it to my living room and let me inspect the entire package, even helped me take it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: B. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Great quality easy to install , was delivered with no damage and as described, great price can not find in stores. I am really satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Deep tub...ahhh! Great for soaking!
customer_reviews.text: Strong sturdy deep tub. Love it. With the lighting in our bathroom, pretty standard, the attic white tub goes well with our sterling white surround. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Jamison Cote

customer_reviews.title: Deep tub!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our purchase of this large, deep tub. It looks great in our newly remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: yeahyeah

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, big headrest area, great depth
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, big headrest area, great soaking depth. Nice finish. Installed well, feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: ADoll

customer_reviews.title: a very nice tub.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Ours had a small nick at the bottom that wasn't seen on inspection. Outside of that, a very nice tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The surface is NOT! slip resistant as described. ...
customer_reviews.text: The surface is NOT! slip resistant as described. I already had a few closed-call. I would have returned it if I found out before the contractor installed it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub
customer_reviews.text: No issues with delivery. Easy to clean, sturdy. It is deep enough for a nice bath!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: deep
customer_reviews.text: Mid level "deep" tub and has a very sound structure. Easy install. Watch out though, the bottom has the no slip surface that is a little rough on the butt...
customer_reviews.author: fish24/7

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Nightmare install.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tub. Absolute nightmare to install if you live on a slab.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tub!
customer_reviews.text: Got the “used” one, in perfect shape, just open box. Good quality, recommended by our plumbers.
customer_reviews.author: Krista J. Westendorp

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: The look, the height and the value were perfect for our little hotel
customer_reviews.author: dorothy s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: extremely happy with tub.came on time and measurements were exact. very sturdy and will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth m barr

customer_reviews.title: New tub in my house
customer_reviews.text: The tub is beautiful. I did the installation myself in three weekends. The tub was brought right to my house so I didn't have to mess around with getting it here on my own. Not to heavy and I used the dimensions from the cut sheet for all my measurements. I was looking for a larger tub to replace the old worn out one and the American standard porcelain tub looked the best.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub, retains heat very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tub regarding heat retention and has a decent, simple look. I added an expensive, quality pop-up drain. The water level dropped less than an inch in about an hour, and the tub retained around 70% of the heat for that period of time as well. Note that there is a "ring" around the tub due to design "shadowing" or something like that. And I was glad that the integrated anti-slip is not like sandpaper, just enough not to slip.
customer_reviews.author: DeMalta

customer_reviews.title: It was great to order online and have it delivered within a ...
customer_reviews.text: The tub arrived exactly as described. It was installed professionally, so I have no personal knowledge of the installation, but my contractor didn't seem to have any problem. It was great to order online and have it delivered within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: L.J. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Deep tub searched for months to find the perfect one .
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Smaller tub makes sense
customer_reviews.text: After removing an outdated garden tub I’m loving the sleek look for my updated bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub for the money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new soaker tub. Deep and wide and water stays pretty hot. Not so heavy that the contractors would have gotten a hernia putting it in. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: loripori

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep soaker tub. Look of porcelain without the cold and noise of a cast iron tub.
customer_reviews.author: MLS-BG

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub
customer_reviews.text: We just had this installed and haven't tried it out yet, but it is a lovely tub and much higher quality than the one it replaced. It is well insulated and the finish is really nice. It is extra-deep and has a non-slip bottom, which means no ugly bath mat in the bottom of the tub! It was delivered quickly and with no hassle. My only issue is that the price dropped by $200 less than two weeks after I ordered it. Amazon doesn't have price-match protection, so I feel a little cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tub, easy to clean, shipped nicely, installed easily, totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub. Some finish problems at the edges
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tub. Some finish problems at the edges, caulk is going to be a bit thick there, but not a big deal. Difficult to level.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Rardon

customer_reviews.title: Nice big tub
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit wider than a typical 30" tub and nice a deep also. You'll notice the difference right away. Keep in mind the deep soak drain assembly is not necessarily required for installation even thought the product description leads you to believe that it is. Chances are your plumber will have to make his own drain anyway unless you are doing new construction. The tubs were delivered all in one piece right on schedule. A+ for the shipping. I will update once installed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality for a good price. The composite material is like cast iron. I looks beautiful in the new bathroom. Finish is very nice and look durable.
customer_reviews.author: Street Dog

customer_reviews.title: American Standard (Cambridge)
customer_reviews.text: Great tub for the money. This is my second purchase or the same type of tub for my house. Overall we're very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: epipko

customer_reviews.title: Finish
customer_reviews.text: Tub was for my client and there was some imperfection - looked like painting wasn't me done right on first time so they repainted again, but it never looked like rest of tub. on outside . Definitely factory problem. We didn't have time to wait week for another piece.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the tub
customer_reviews.text: Very deep, excellent heat retention, at least compared with thin metal/enamelled tubs, and lightweight, so no fears of crushing a worker during installation!
customer_reviews.author: Unsung Heroines

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: I searched many online sites as well as in store prices. I did find one online site that had a slightly lower price, however, they wanted to charge me a shipping fee of $150.00. Unbelievable! Amazon comes through again. The tub arrived in excellent condition. The tub is perfect - a nice deep soaking tub that will wow the buyers when we decide to sell - which won't be for a long time, I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Helpa

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was not damaged. The exterior finish etc ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was not damaged. The exterior finish etc had no problems. The underside around the drain is missing approximately 1/3 to 1/2 of the finish so there is no way for the drain to be properly sat and sealed from the underneath. See attached picture. It needs to be smooth and complete
customer_reviews.author: Ed Star

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tub
customer_reviews.text: I like this tub, however, it seems to be pretty standard size it is not any bigger than any other tub. The deepness is not a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Feels smaller than you would think!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the length and width of the tub are given, and yes the tub fits the space, the actual room that you have to sit is not as much as you would think. The length of the tub is 60 inches, but a good amount of that is used up by the way the back of the tub is designed, and it's hard to know that until you actually see it in person. Arrived in good condition, and the delivery went very well due to the excellent delivery person. The tub feels small, even for my daughter who is 5 feet tall, 120 pounds, if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Trahan

customer_reviews.title: I think the quality is very good and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: The tub arrived earlier than expected with no issues. I think the quality is very good and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bathtub.
customer_reviews.text: Very clean looking and sturdy feel bathtub. We ordered it for our kids bathroom. Huge difference comparing to the old plastic tub this one replaced. It works well with the contemporary style of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my bathtub. I soak in it regular. Looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: lorna cummings

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bathtub is perfect! It's the perfect size, not too big and not too small. The invisible diamonds on the bottom of the tub work perfectly to prevent accidental slips. The tub is easy to clean, and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Great soaking tub for small bathrooms...
customer_reviews.text: I like the tub because it fit the very small footprint of our guest bath. Deep enough for a good soak, however I'm 5'4" and average size for what it's worth. I wanted the nonslip coating on the bottom, but as other reviewers have said it is not mentioned in the description, and not everyone may like the look. Good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kismets mom

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: This a a great tub. Installed easily. Nice finish on the surface. Very deep and really holds the heat of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a soaker tub!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very deep spacious tub. I am six feet tall and I fit into that tub just fine. Great for that relaxing bubble bath.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Noble

customer_reviews.title: Very good upgrade to standard bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bathtub after a bad experience with another on-line seller. The tub arrived in excellent condition without any shipping damage. The tub quality is very good however the only negative is that support brackets for apron are not steel and bend easily during installation. AS, how much is saved not using steel for these critical supports? Although this tub can be used as a whirlpool, I am only using this as standard bathtub primarily because the depth and width is greater compared to standard bath tubs.
customer_reviews.author: Arvid Podsim

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition but a little late. (It was a long truck trip across the Country.) Plumber installed without issue. He preferred to put together his own overflow and drain which looks and works well. The deeper tub adds a little "something" extra to the average bathroom. Very happy both with Amazon customer service and with the product. Because the tub is deep, consider installing a grab bar/safety bar to get in and out. Useful even for folks who are not elderly or infirm.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Duck

customer_reviews.title: Man size and easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for a man and cleans up with some scrubbing bubbles and a wipe in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KittyK

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We spent some time looking for a tub before deciding on this one and its even more than expected! Nice and deep. Perfect for a long relaxing soak. We did not buy the American Standard drain but bought one from the big box store and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub with good size
customer_reviews.text: Nice tub with good size. seems to be well constructed and both sturdy and light at the same time. It was easier to install since it was on the lighter side, I could actually do it myself. Install is simple, you hang a stringer 2x4 up and set it in. After install is seemed very sturdy, not cast iron but not flimsy either. I didn't seem hard to clean or easily scratched but to be honest it was in the guest bath so it didn't get used much and then I sold the house. I would say I was happy with the purchase for ease of installation, construction, and looks.
customer_reviews.author: SteelersFan

customer_reviews.title: The tub is great. It is a deep soaking tub that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The tub is great. It is a deep soaking tub that is great. The same tub in stores was at least $200 higher than Amazon site. We love it! Best part....it was delivered to the house. Getting it from the store to the house is half the battle.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured and a nice bright white
customer_reviews.text: Tub is lovely. Just as pictured and a nice bright white. Delivery was seamless. Still installing, so not sure about the user experience but it's been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lovethefall123

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Nice and deep
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Nice and deep, I can't WAIT to finish this bathroom reno and take a long hot bath. Will try and comment after she's cristened!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Duke

customer_reviews.title: Not square.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star review, but! But the tub it's self was defective in that the tub is square and level. The long run of the inside of the tub is a full 1/4' dipped in the middle and bows, same with the left side of the tub. Not good at all. I would have filed for a return, but considreding the item was already installed we worked the tile around the defects. Otherwise the tub is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jack's Revenge

customer_reviews.title: Great tub for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tub for the money. Once again could not find anything this good in local stores. Everyone was surprised that we got a tub online but it was just what we needed the price was right and it arrived in plenty of time for our bathroom remodel. It is a very sturdy tub.
customer_reviews.author: Not Xmas

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: its a great tub. I replaced a my old fiberglass tub/shower kit with this model. I love it. no complaints. very deep, modern and easy to clean. floor has traction pad, subtle, in the bottom so no need for a pad or mat. i would recommend it to others. definitely agree that it is not plastic or acrylic but is indeed americast. too heavy to move solo, about 240lb, but holds well amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyLady80

product_meta.title: American Standard 2460002.020 Cambridge Apron-Front Americast Soaking Bathtub Left Hand Drain, 5 Ft x 32 In, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteA durable, lightweight and less costly alternative to cast iron, the Cambridge apron-front Americast soaking bathtub from American standard invites relaxation. The exclusive Americast technology incorporates a glossy enamel top layer that’s easy to clean, a steel center for strength, and a thick, insulating layer to keep water warmer for a longer, more enjoyable bath. Crafted for bathing comfort and safety, this traditional tub has a beveled headrest, contoured lumbar support and a slip-resistant floor surface.

AMAZON.COM


 THE AMERICAN STANDARD CAMBRIDGE 5-FOOT BATHTUB 
The American Standard Cambridge americast 5-foot bathtub is perfect for long and enjoyable baths. Made of americast material, the tub is 50% lighter and more durable than a traditional cast iron tub. It is also easier to install with its integral apron. The integral apron means the bathroom facing side of the tub is already finished. Your plumber will enjoy having one less thing to do and your wallet will enjoy the money you have saved. The Cambridge is also safe and comfortable with its slip-resistant surface and beveled headrest. The Cambridge 5-foot bathtub is a perfect addition to your bathroom. Available in bone, linen, and white finishes.

The Cambridge 5-foot bathtub is a perfect addition to your bathroom.  view larger

Americast Construction Americast is a revolutionary alternative to cast iron bathtubs exclusively available from American Standard. An americast bath tub features several advantages over a traditional cast iron tub, they are more durable, 50% lighter, and costs less to install. Americast also has several manufacturing benefits allowing the bathtub to be made deeper, flatter, and roomier.

Easy Installation Installing a American Standard Cambridge bathtub is a job you do not have to keep putting off or making excuses about. With its 32-inch width, the Cambridge fits easily into standard bath alcoves. There is no need to build a supportive platform either as the Cambridge features an integral apron. Meaning your bathroom facing side of the tub is already finished. To allow for a quicker installation, the Cambridge also features an integral tile flange along the three wall sides of the tub. The tile flange allows the tub to stay in place while setting tile that meets with the tub. The Cambridge bathtub is designed for easy installation, so you can get the job finished on time and move on to enjoying a bath in your new tub.

Stylish Comfort Style and comfort come together in the Cambridge's classic design. Complementing the bathtub's gently curved and embracing bathing well, the apron front has a single, linear contour. To give the bathtub a pleasurable bathing experience the Cambridge features a lumbar supportive contour and a beveled headrest. With the American Standard Cambridge your bathroom can be stylish and enjoyable. Now you can have a comfortable place to enjoy soaking away your stressful days.

Designed with You in Mind Throw away your unsanitary mats. You do not need any tapes to prevent slippage either. For your safety the Cambridge tub's bottom of the bathing well is designed to be fully slip-resistant.

In addition, the Cambridge complies with the ADA (Americans with Disabilities Act) when a bath seat is installed at the drain end of the tub.

About American Standard Brands American Standard brands has a complete lineup of chinaware featuring vitreous china or fine fire clay. From high performance to high style--and everything in between--American Standard delivers the products you need with the quality and value to fit any project.

Dimensions The American Standard Cambridge americast bathtub measures 60 by 32 by 17-3/4 inches (1524 by 813 by 451 millimeters). The bathing well dimensions are 54 by 26 by 17 inches (1372 by 660 by 432 millimeters)

What's in the Box American Standard Cambridge americast 5-foot bathtub with left-hand drain.

 CAMBRIDGE 5-FOOT AMERICAST BATHTUB AT A GLANCE:
 *  Americast construction
 * Glossy porcelain finish
 * Designed for easy installation
 * Full slip-resistant surface
 * ADA compliant with seat installed at head end



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
American Standard Cambridge Americast 5-Feet Left Hand Bathtub, White no.2460.002.020. The American Standard Princeton bathtub is constructed of Americast, a material patented by American Standard that bonds a high quality enamel surface with a high quality metal and a molded reinforcement material backing, and is a lighter, more durable alternative to cast iron. It has a glossy porcelain finish and fully slip-resistant surface for additional safety. Left hand drain outlet. Americast Layered Construction American Standard improved traditional cast iron by developing Americast. A remarkable alternative that's more durable, weighs half as much, and costs less to install. It even retains heat longer and emits less sound. Americast is American Standard's patented process that bonds a high quality porcelain enamel surface with an enameling grade metal and a molded reinforcement material backing. About American Standard Brands Great performance and great looks meet in our complete line of fixtures and faucets for bath and kitchen. Performance and reliability. Coordinated collections. Ingenious features. American Standard is Style that Works Better everyday.

Durable, non-porous, glossy porcelain enamel finish is scratch resistant, easy to clean and retains luster
Formed steel center layer is strong and stable
Americast backing insulates the tub for a quieter showering experience
Americast backing insulates for heat retention to help keep bath water warmer longer

Padded carrying bars and leveling grid for easy installation
